metadata.title: CVE-2020-15861 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Net-SNMP through 5.7.3 allows Escalation of Privileges because of UNIXsymbolic link (symlink) following.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15861` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsnmp-base - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
libsnmp-perl - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
libsnmp35 - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
snmp - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
snmpd - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
snmptrapd - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
tkmib - 5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: net-snmp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.8+dfsg-2ubuntu2.3').
